meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or astonishment.
meanings.sent1: Crikey! That magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: Crikey, I can't believe how fast that car is!
meanings.sent3: Crikey, did you see that huge rainbow after the storm?
meanings.sent4: Crikey, the fireworks lit up the night sky like a colorful explosion!
meanings.sent5: Crikey, the surprise party was like a burst of happiness!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of dismay or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Oh crikey, I forgot my keys at home!
meanings.sent2: Crikey, I spilled juice on my favorite shirt!
meanings.sent3: Crikey, I missed the bus by just a few seconds!
meanings.sent4: Crikey, the computer crashed right before I saved my work!
meanings.sent5: Crikey, the rain ruined our picnic plans!
